content: Dream, Dream Dream….!! Dreams transform into thoughts And thoughts result in action.
Don’t take rest after your first victory because if you fail in second, more lips are waiting to say that your first victory was just luck.
Man needs difficulties in life because they are necessary to enjoy the success.
If you want to shine like a sun. First burn like a sun.
All of us do not have equal talent. But , all of us have an equal opportunity to develop our talents.
It is very easy to defeat someone, But it is very hard to win someone.
Courage to think differently, courage to invent, to travel the unexplored path, courage to discover the impossible and to conquer the problems and succeed.
To succeed in your mission, you must have single-minded devotion to your goal.
